mov ax, 9    = 10000000 00101001 00001001
mov ax, [9]  = 10000000 10100001 00001001
mov [ax], 9  = 10000000 01101010 00001001
mov [ax], in = 00000000 01000010
mov ax, [in] = 00000000 10000001

push 9       = 10100000 01101001 00001001
pop ax       = 00110000 10001001

push pc      = 00100000 01100001
jmp 9        = 10000000 00101011 00001001
jmp [in]     = 00000000 10000011
ret          = 00110000 10001011 // mov stk, pc

jz 9         = 10010000 00101011 00001001

sub stk      = 01110001 10001001


program
=======
mov sp, 16
mov ax, 9
loop:
push ax
mov ax, 1
add stk
jmp :loop


10000000 00101000 00010000
10000000 00101001 00001001
00100000 01010001
10000000 00101001 00000001
01110000 10001001
10000000 00101010 00000110


80 28 10
80 29 09
20 51
80 29 01
70 89
80 2a 06
